uploads.subTitle: Upload a CSV File with the following columns: first_name, last_name, password, email, extension, mac_address, brand, family, model.
uploads.text: Drag and drop your file here to upload, or browse your computer.

success.headline: You successfully uploaded a CSV file, please click on Proceed to continue!

errors.wrongType: Invalid type, we only accept CSV files and we received: {{type}}

review.title: Please review your imported file

headline.second: Number of records in this file:
headline.third: We selected the first 5 records to help you review the mappings below and check to make sure they are correct. Once you've approved or fixed the mappings, go ahead and submit the import job.

errors.title: It appears that the columns matching didn't go as expected, please fix the following issues:

review.hasCustomizations: Do you want to add JSON configs?

progress.title: Your CSV Import is in progress!
progress.subTitle: Please wait on this page as the data is loaded into the system. Closing the tab or leaving this page will terminate the import.

customizations.title: Customize User, Device, Voicemail Boxes
customizations.subTitle: Paste a JSON Payload in the area below, and we'll merge these settings for each record
